Text: Hello from LesJim I continue to see that Enron is dominating a large section of the energy industry news these days I hope everything is going well for you and that when everything shakes out you will as always come out shining Best wishes Les
Hello from Up State New YorkJim Ive been reading a lot about your company recently in the press Hang in there sport and good luck Just remember youre smarter and better then the rest of them Les
